response.overview: Part II of the feature length film "The Chamber", WW goes in search for her fallen comrade against Division's orders. Without support, WW enters the Vain's world and exposes herself unnecessarily. In spite of everything she witnessed on the live feed, and with the further knowledge of how many victims fell before her, her arrogance leads her blindly, straight into harmâ€™s way. Before she knows it, she too is caught up in the mental manipulation of a mastermind who is simply steps ahead of her. Vain foretells her demise early on but even this falls on deaf ears. With her rescue attempt on shaky ground, how bad will the situation get? We know she survives, but what will she lose in the process to save herself?
response.title: The Chamber Part 2
